name: GBRausers-2
description:
GB Rausers 2

A game inspired by Luftrausers, made for GB Jam #5 using the Defold engine

Originally Created by Björn Ritzl for GBJam, I decided to take the game and add some modifications

Modifications to original GBRausers

  • Added screen shake effect
  • Added sound effects for shooting
  • Added background music for menus and main game stage

GB Jam #5 version

This is the version submitted to GB Jam 5: https://britzl.itch.io/gbjamrausers

Improved Version of the Game by britzl

Play the improved version by Björn Ritzl based on the current code base here: https://britzl.github.io/gbrausers/

Source code for modifications

My personal modifications to the game can be found at: https://github.com/ahmedmaawy/gbrausers

Sound Credits

  • Game soundtracks credits: 3xBlast.
  • Shoot sound effect credtis: LittleRobotSoundFactory.
